column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////My Wife and I had an amazing weekend in Houston and was well complemented with our visit to BOSSCAT!! It was the 7th game Astro's VS Yankees and we stayed for 5 hours drinking and eating our fill! The food was phenomenal and the whisky flights made everything that much better
column2: great recommendations. We were welcomed by the entire staff and the bartenders made us feel like locals being that we are from Minnesota. I highly highly recommend this establishment to anyone looking for the complete dining experience. Cheers!
